sentences.sContent: The Li code embraced beliefs, ethics, manners, deportment, social behaviour, ceremony and statecraft.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Li code embraced beliefs, ethics, manners, deportment, social behaviour, ceremony and statecraft.
sentences.sCn: 这个礼仪规范包括信念、伦理、礼貌、举止、社会行为、礼仪和治国之道。

remMethod.val: 部门 (department) 的行为 (deportment) 代表着公司的形象

trans.tranOther: the way that someone behaves in public
